mapper.sql: ID, PAYMENT_ORDER_ID, STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, CURRENCY, PAY_WAY, PAY_SOURCE, PAY_ACCOUNT, PAY_CHANNEL, PAY_CHANNEL_NO, PAY_WAY_TYPE, PAY_TRADE_FLOW_NO, BANK_TRADE_FLOW_NO, CREATE_TIME, PAY_SUCCESS_TIME, CANCEL_TIME, REMARK, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, MERCHANT_NO, SUB_MERCHANT_NO, COMPLETE_TIME, PAY_COMPANY, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MESSAGE, IP, SETTLEDAY, SETTLE_DAY, CONFIRM_TIME, PENDING_STATUS, TRANSLATED_ERROR_CODE, TRANSLATED_ERROR_MESSAGE, CHECK_STATUS, CHECK_TIME, SUBJECT_NO, CALL_TYPE, VERSION, CONSUME_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT (ID, PAYMENT_ORDER_ID, STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, CURRENCY, PAY_WAY, PAY_SOURCE, PAY_ACCOUNT, PAY_CHANNEL, PAY_CHANNEL_NO, PAY_WAY_TYPE, PAY_TRADE_FLOW_NO, BANK_TRADE_FLOW_NO, CREATE_TIME, PAY_SUCCESS_TIME, CANCEL_TIME, REMARK, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, MERCHANT_NO, SUB_MERCHANT_NO, COMPLETE_TIME, PAY_COMPANY, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MESSAGE, IP, SETTLEDAY, SETTLE_DAY, CONFIRM_TIME, PENDING_STATUS, TRANSLATED_ERROR_CODE, TRANSLATED_ERROR_MESSAGE, CHECK_STATUS, CHECK_TIME, SUBJECT_NO, CALL_TYPE, VERSION, CONSUME_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payChannelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payWayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paySuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pendingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{translatedErrorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{translatedErrorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subjectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{consumeTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

update LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PAYMENT_ORDER_ID = #{record.paymentOrderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{record.orderAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CURRENCY = #{record.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_WAY = #{record.payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_SOURCE = #{record.paySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ACCOUNT = #{record.payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_CHANNEL = #{record.payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_CHANNEL_NO = #{record.payChannelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_WAY_TYPE = #{record.payWayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{record.payTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{record.bankTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_SUCCESS_TIME = #{record.paySuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CANCEL_TIME = #{record.cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MERCHANT_NO = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_MERCHANT_NO = #{record.subMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{record.completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_COMPANY = #{record.payCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_CODE = #{record.errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_MESSAGE = #{record.errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLEDAY = #{record.settleday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_DAY = #{record.settleDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{record.confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PENDING_STATUS = #{record.pendingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSLATED_ERROR_CODE = #{record.translatedErrorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSLATED_ERROR_MESSAGE = #{record.translatedErrorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STATUS = #{record.checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_TIME = #{record.checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBJECT_NO = #{record.subjectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_TYPE = #{record.callType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CONSUME_TIME = #{record.consumeTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

update LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT
PAYMENT_ORDER_ID = #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_WAY = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_SOURCE = #{paySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ACCOUNT = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_CHANNEL = #{payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_CHANNEL_NO = #{payChannelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_WAY_TYPE = #{payWayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{payTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{bankTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_SUCCESS_TIME = #{paySuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_MERCHANT_NO = #{subMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_COMPANY = #{payCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLEDAY = #{settleday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_DAY = #{settleDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PENDING_STATUS = #{pendingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSLATED_ERROR_CODE = #{translatedErrorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSLATED_ERROR_MESSAGE = #{translatedErrorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_TIME = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBJECT_NO = #{subjectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_TYPE = #{callType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CONSUME_TIME = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT set PAYMENT_ORDER_ID = #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_WAY = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_SOURCE = #{paySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ACCOUNT = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_CHANNEL = #{payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_CHANNEL_NO = #{payChannelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_WAY_TYPE = #{payWayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{payTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_TRADE_FLOW_NO = #{bankTradeFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_SUCCESS_TIME = #{paySuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_MERCHANT_NO = #{subMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLETE_TIME = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_COMPANY = #{payCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLEDAY = #{settleday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_DAY = #{settleDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PENDING_STATUS = #{pendingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSLATED_ERROR_CODE = #{translatedErrorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSLATED_ERROR_MESSAGE = #{translatedErrorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_TIME = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBJECT_NO = #{subjectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALL_TYPE = #{callType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CONSUME_TIME = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select:
select
from LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT where create_time < current timestamp -35 days and create_time > current timestamp -40 days and status in ('UNPAY','PROCESSING','ERROR') /*order by id fetch first 2000 rows only */

select t.ID PAYMENTID, t.PAYMENT_ORDER_ID ORDERID from LM_PAY.T_PAYMENT t where t.CREATE_TIME > '${startTime}' and t.CREATE_TIME <= '${endTime}'
and t.PAY_WAY = 'WEB'
and t.PAY_WAY in ('SWIFT','PROXY')
and t.status in ('UNPAY','PROCESSING','ERROR') order by t.ID DESC
